DOC.brief_summary: This project address vital question regard best design web-based material grow population patient basic literacy computer skill low level health literacy , build previous experience develop web-based material people low level literacy health literacy . This study carry two phase . Phase 1 use qualitative method understand user experience web-based material observational 'think-aloud ' interview user . Phase 2 test newly develop web-based material static ( non-interactive ) version material online .
DOC.brief_title: Web-based Support People With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Potential participant patient Type 2 diabetes age 18 year , able consent . Severe mental health problem , palliative care , recent bereavement , know opposition involvement research inability complete research measure , e.g . learn disability , inability read / speak English .
